sources.title: Hangmans House (1928)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. This romantic drama takes place in Ireland and follows a man who is on the run from the law. Not only that, he has returned to Ireland with the intention to kill a man. Though it was a box office failure on release, modern reviews praise the atmosphere of the picture, comparing it to Gothic Horror settings.Â
